rationale: Table t0048 provides a granular disaggregation of Alphabet's revenue by product and service lines including 'Google Search & other', 'YouTube ads', 'Google Network', 'Google advertising', 'Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices', 'Google Services total', 'Google Cloud', 'Other Bets', 'Hedging gains (losses)', and a 'Total revenues' row. It covers recent fiscal years 2023 and 2024, is from Item 8 / Notes, and aligns well with the requested business lines (Google Services, Google Cloud, Other Bets) and keyword hints. It is more granular than segment-level totals and includes the total revenue row, making it the best fit.
